: : Kup : :

Kup went streight into his war story mode. He sat down and motioned at Quet.

Kup: Tell me, lad, have you ever seen the chaos bringer Unicron?


airly2000 <airly2002@...> wrote:
Quet

Quet looked to Grimlock and Kup and said "Now what we do??? sat down 
around and try to scare us each other with Decepticons tales????"
